verbs.description: [ARG0: russia] [V: hits] [ARG1: a snag in developing a hypersonic weapon] [ARGM-TMP: after putin said it was already in production russia is currently unable to find a source for the critical carbon fiber components needed for one of its hypersonic weapons according to people with direct knowledge of a u s intelligence report cnbc putin carnegie endowment for international peace u s washington president vladimir putin belarus director representative vladimir putin co - director eric pahon pentagon hans kristensen defense department weapon federation of american scientists russia james acton avangard nuclear information project moscow]
